alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 3:27AM MST until November 25 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations generally between 8 and 12 inches with locally higher amounts on some west-facing slopes. * WHERE...Northern and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 1 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible due to snow packed roads and low visibility. Check road conditions before heading out.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
